cells.data:
To get anaconda working, remember to:
`export PATH=~/anaconda3/bin:$PATH` (until I'm able to access .bashrc to permanently include it.)

Virtual environment of python3.7 installed as `.vidobj`
To activate, `conda activate .vidobj`

Then,enter the following in the original terminal (important):
```
export XDG_RUNTIME_DIR=""
```
Then, open jupyter notebook:
```
jupyter notebook --no-browser --port=8880 --ip='0.0.0.0'
```
Then navigate to the indicated link in the browser.
